titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the Department of Veterans Affairs Health Professionals Educational Assistance Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary: 4/25/2013--Introduced. Extends through 2019 (under current law, 2014) the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) health professionals educational assistance program. Repeals the current $60,000 per-individual limit on education debt reduction payments made by the VA with respect to certain employees providing direct-patient care services or services incident thereto.
